column4: sorry sort of new to debian/ubuntu I want to backport the nvidia driver from 11.04 to 10.04 I was wondering how I use apt-get to download the source from a different version?
put in a deb-src line for the old version and use apt-get source -t <old version> <package>
im on 10.04 and im trying to get the files out of 11.04?
